definition: the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
to have a weight on one's mind/to take on a mental burden

sentences.english: We put our backpacks on the board and swam in the water pushing the board.
sentences.chinese: 我们把背包放到木板上，推着木板在水里游。

sentences.english: Just a few things off the top of my head regarding upgradable bags.
sentences.chinese: 一些关于背包升级的想法一直在我脑海里盘旋。
帆布背包中的东西塞到爆？

sentences.english: But we still can't strap on a jetpack and zoom off to Tesco for our groceries.
sentences.chinese: 只是，我们还不能绑着喷气背包去乐购买杂货。

sentences.english: He grabbed the pack with the FENRIS warheads, and swung it over his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他抓起装着芬里斯核弹头的背包，甩上了他的肩膀。

sentences.english: This quick-change artist is for you.
sentences.chinese: 这款能快速变换的背包正是你所需要的。

sentences.english: His heart felt as heavy as his backpack as he opened the door to his house and went inside.
sentences.chinese: 推门走进家时，他的心情如同身上的背包一样沉重。

sentences.english: My one big exception is my hiking and backpacking gear.
sentences.chinese: 我的一个最大的例外是我的徒步旅行背包装备。

sentences.english: The Mares Cruise Journey Backpack has rugged construction with spiral zips and metal pull.
sentences.chinese: 母马邮轮之旅背包已与螺旋拉链和金属拉坚固的结构。

sentences.english: Luckily they were able to hop back into the backpack for a rest.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是他们能够跳回到背包上来休息一下。

sentences.english: You found a satchel in Galleons, what would you do?
sentences.chinese: 你发现了一个背包里面有加隆，你会怎么做？

sentences.english: The bear ignored him and continued to search through the pack.
sentences.chinese: 熊不理他，继续在背包里搜寻。

sentences.english: He squirmed out of the straps of his backpack.
sentences.chinese: 他扭动身体，挣开背包的肩带。

sentences.english: You can buy clothing patterns and a bigger bag at the sewing store.
sentences.chinese: 在缝纫店不仅可以购买服装图纸，也可以扩充背包。

sentences.english: Emboldened, I yanked the strap of her backpack and then pushed her.
sentences.chinese: 我壮了壮胆，猛拽她背包的带子，然后往前一推。

definition: to (carry) on one's person/to (take) with one
